projects.title: FastMCP & FastMCP-Tool-Generator
projects.subtitle: Advanced MCP Implementation with Automatic Tool Generation
projects.description: MCP implementation with client having automatic tool generation capabilities and an orchestration layer for improving chain of thought reasoning for MCP architecture. Features advanced prompt engineering and real-time tool synthesis.
highlights: Automatic tool generation from natural language descriptions
Advanced chain of thought reasoning implementation
Scalable orchestration layer for complex AI workflows

projects.title: MCP-RAG
projects.subtitle: Custom LLM Backend with Agentic AI Capabilities
projects.description: Custom LLM backend client using Anthropic's MCP for designing Agentic AI system with RAG capabilities. Implements sophisticated document intelligence and real-time information retrieval.
highlights: Agentic AI system with autonomous decision-making
Advanced RAG implementation with vector search
Scalable backend architecture for enterprise use

projects.title: Law Interpreter
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Legal Document Analysis System
projects.description: Advanced AI system for legal document interpretation, contract analysis, and compliance checking. Utilizes multi-modal input processing and transformer architectures for accurate legal text understanding.
highlights: Advanced contract analysis and risk assessment

projects.title: Quantum Neural Network
projects.subtitle: Research on Quantum Machine Learning
projects.description: Experiments and research regarding implementation of Quantum Neural Networks and Hybrid implementations. Explores the intersection of quantum computing and machine learning for next-generation AI systems.
highlights: Research contributions to quantum ML field

projects.title: Grocer Ease Chatbot
projects.subtitle: Production-Ready Conversational AI System
projects.description: Advanced conversational AI system for grocery shopping assistance. Features natural language understanding, product recommendations, and seamless integration with e-commerce platforms.

projects.title: Local LLM API
projects.subtitle: Self-Hosted Large Language Model API
projects.description: Local implementation of large language model API for private and secure AI applications. Optimized for performance and privacy with custom inference optimization.

projects.title: DeepGuard
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Security System
projects.description: Advanced AI security system for threat detection and prevention. Implements machine learning algorithms for anomaly detection and automated response mechanisms.

projects.title: Large Language Models Research
projects.subtitle: LLM Experimentation and Prompt Engineering
projects.description: Experiments on popular LLM base models such as FLAN T5, Llama2 7B, etc. Includes comprehensive prompt engineering research and model fine-tuning experiments.

projects.title: Predicting Probability of Default
projects.subtitle: Financial Risk Assessment ML Model
projects.description: Predicting risk ratio of a company defaulting when they take a loan from a bank. Term project based on real-world data with over 1.2 million company records, achieving AUC > 0.8.

projects.title: Multi-Modal M&A Agreement Extraction
projects.subtitle: Advanced Document Intelligence System
projects.description: Utilized advanced transformer architectures and fine-tuned BERT models for M&A agreement extraction, utilizing fuzzy matching algorithms and multi-modal inputs for enhanced accuracy.

projects.title: Data Analysis on Movie Ratings
projects.subtitle: Comprehensive Data Science Project
projects.description: Data Analysis on real world data of movie ratings by 1000 users. Comprehensive statistical analysis, visualization, and machine learning modeling for recommendation systems.

projects.title: Recommendation Systems using Big Data
projects.subtitle: Scalable ML Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Implementation of scalable recommendation systems using big data technologies. Features collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, and hybrid approaches for personalized recommendations.

projects.title: Virtual Adaptive Learning Assistant (VALA)
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Educational Platform
projects.description: Engineered an agentic chatbot system for student testing, assessment and learning feedback. Implemented RL-based prompt tweaking for customized learning plans based on repetitive learning and testing.

projects.title: Automated ML Code Generation Platform
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Development Tool
projects.description: Engineered an automated deep learning model generation platform, leveraging PyTorch/TensorFlow for model architecture creation, and optimized models for performance using guided architectural visualizations.

projects.title: Agentic Health Guidance System
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Healthcare Assistant
projects.description: Developed and maintained agentic LLM-based systems for personalized health guidance using structured prompts and RAG pipelines. Integrated OpenAI APIs with in-house databases for comprehensive health insights.
